attributes.action: Ensure Alan Shearer becomes the next England manager to instill pride in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Steve maclarean (no heart), Sven (wimp, no passion), (coppello, angry....just angry), hodgeson (comedy value)........shearer (absolute legend, pride, belief, strength, no nonsense, leader).
attributes.background:
Over the past 19 years the FA has appointed managers for the national team with little if not any ability to project, instill or enhance a sense of national pride into our country's selected players.
the national team has an effect on us the people and we deserve to be heart broken no more!
